name: ML.01 - BAG
description: Luxury apparel for your Loot Bags. This token can be burned to redeem a physical bag of 1/1 handcrafted apparel/accessories custom embroidered with the adventurer gear in your Loot Bag; plus a 3D metaverse wearable NFT. Synthetic or OG Loot. Free shipping worldwide included. Redemptions to open ~November 2021. Physical Content: Drawstring Loot Bag, Hoodie, Pants, Hat, Socks, Gaiter, Gloves. (Subject to change.)
